question_en: What means 'Not your Keys, not your Coins'?
option_en_1: Technically you do not need private keys to own Bitcoin
option_en_2: Without exclusive control over the private key, you effectively don't own the coins
option_en_3: Hardware wallets are fundamentally unsafe and should be avoided
option_en_4: Lost passwords can always be recovered by Bitcoin customer support
